subject: Specification for Avenue and Median Plantations - reg.
text: "Rdy 7sty  <THPf giferabrut (Tsw5 4Raen # RTTHPf HA1T4, HRT FRTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tinn T4 vfl-5 Qd 6, Haz7-10, ERWT, # fcrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 THI /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/Environment/2022 Policy Circular No 7.4.8/2022 dated O6th October, 2022 [Decision taken on File No. NHAI/ModifiedSchedulesforPlantaion/2022 (Computer No: 143718)] CORRIGENDUM Sub: Specification for Avenue and Median Plantations reg: In partial modification of NHAI Policy Circular No. 7.4.7/2022 dated 12th July, 2022 on Specification for Avenue and Median Plantations, the Clause (viii) of Schedule-D is amended as follows: (2) Schedule-D (viii) Avenue Plantation (Clause 11.14 and 8 & 9 of IRC-SP: 21.2009) a Spacing between rows: 3m b Spacing between plant to plant 1 1st Row: 3m ji. Row: 6m jii. 3rd Row: 8-12m 2 The other text of the circular remains unchanged. 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd) Chief General Manager (Coord. To: AII Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2  Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation La U U 91 NHAL Fig: 2nd
